# See http://developer.android.com/guide/developing/projects/projects-cmdline.html

# New android project created with
android create project --target 1 --name Platypi --path ./android --activity CollectDataActivity --package edu.caltech.cs3.platypi

# Don't check autogenerated stuff into git
echo android/bin/ >> .gitignore
echo android/gen/ >> .gitignore
git add .gitignore

# Can build the project from within the android directory.
# These commands will install CollectDataActivity on a running emulator.
cd android
ant debug install

# For more targets of the default build file generated by android, do
ant
